languages.text: "К вашим услугам — не только я, но и мои подданные. Секретарь сейчас выполняет проверку обслуги и очищает усадьбу от следов нападения. Многоуважаемый магос, отвечающий за агрономические работы на планете, также в усадьбе — как раз на этой неделе он прибыл для личного отчета. И, конечно же, моя помощница в войне с бунтовщиками, Ирлиэт. Не сомневаюсь, она будет счастлива угодить своими познаниями о Янусе вашему сиятельству!"

traits.locale_text: "К вашим услугам — не только я, но и мои подданные. Секретарь сейчас выполняет проверку обслуги и очищает усадьбу от следов нападения. Многоуважаемый магос, отвечающий за агрономические работы на планете, также в усадьбе — как раз на этой неделе он прибыл для личного отчета. И, конечно же, моя помощница в войне с бунтовщиками, Ирлиэт. Не сомневаюсь, она будет счастлива угодить своими познаниями о Янусе вашему сиятельству!"

languages.text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: "К вашим услугам — не только я, но и мои подданные. Секретарь сейчас выполняет проверку обслуги и очищает усадьбу от следов нападения. Многоуважаемый магос, отвечающий за агрономические работы на планете, также в усадьбе — как раз на этой неделе он прибыл для личного отчета. И, конечно же, моя помощница в войне с бунтовщиками, Ирлиэт. Не сомневаюсь, она будет счастлива угодить своими познаниями о Янусе вашему сиятельству!"

An esteemed magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: “我，以及我的全体随从，都愿意为您服务。就在我们说话的这段期间，我的秘书正在检查所有工作人员，清理庄园，消除袭击留下的痕迹。我们受人尊敬的贤者也来了。他负责这颗行星的农业工作，这周刚好要造访总督府，提交他的个人报告。还有，伊莉耶特目前在协助我对抗叛乱分子。我非常确信，她一定很愿意与您分享她对加努斯的了解，大人！”
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: “我，以及我的全体随从，都愿意为您服务。就在我们说话的这段期间，我的秘书正在检查所有工作人员，清理庄园，消除袭击留下的痕迹。我们受人尊敬的贤者也来了。他负责这颗行星的农业工作，这周刚好要造访总督府，提交他的个人报告。还有，伊莉耶特目前在协助我对抗叛乱分子。我非常确信，她一定很愿意与您分享她对加努斯的了解，大人！”

languages.text: «Mi séquito y yo estamos plenamente a su disposición. Mi secretario está interrogando al personal en estos momentos, además de eliminando todo rastro del ataque. Un ilustre magos, responsable de los esfuerzos agrícolas del planeta, también está presente. Había venido esta semana a presentar su informe de forma personal. Y, naturalmente, está mi ayudante en la guerra contra los rebeldes, Yrliet. ¡Seguro que está encantada de compartir sus conocimientos sobre Janus con mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi séquito y yo estamos plenamente a su disposición. Mi secretario está interrogando al personal en estos momentos, además de eliminando todo rastro del ataque. Un ilustre magos, responsable de los esfuerzos agrícolas del planeta, también está presente. Había venido esta semana a presentar su informe de forma personal. Y, naturalmente, está mi ayudante en la guerra contra los rebeldes, Yrliet. ¡Seguro que está encantada de compartir sus conocimientos sobre Janus con mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: 「私でも従者でも、何なりと。申し上げたとおり、私の秘書官は職員の確認を行うと共に、襲撃を受けたあらゆる痕跡を屋敷から排除しているところです。尊敬受けし賢人、すなわちこの星で作物の栽培試験責任者もこちらに—たまたま今週、個人報告書を提出しに来ていました。もちろん、反乱軍との戦争における側近、ユリエットも。ヤヌスに関するその知識を、よろこんで陛下に共有することでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: 「私でも従者でも、何なりと。申し上げたとおり、私の秘書官は職員の確認を行うと共に、襲撃を受けたあらゆる痕跡を屋敷から排除しているところです。尊敬受けし賢人、すなわちこの星で作物の栽培試験責任者もこちらに—たまたま今週、個人報告書を提出しに来ていました。もちろん、反乱軍との戦争における側近、ユリエットも。ヤヌスに関するその知識を、よろこんで陛下に共有することでしょう！」

languages.text: "Ich und mein Gefolge stehen zu Eurer Verfügung. Mein Sekretär überprüft derzeit die Bediensteten und entfernt alle Spuren des Angriffs auf dem Anwesen. Außerdem befindet sich ein anerkannter Magos hier, der für die agronomischen Bemühungen auf dem Planeten verantwortlich ist – er ist zufällig in dieser Woche auf Besuch, um seinen persönlichen Bericht abzuliefern. Und natürlich ist da noch meine Helferin im Krieg gegen die Rebellen, Yrliet. Sie wird mit Sicherheit gerne ihr Wissen über Janus mit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} teilen!"
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich und mein Gefolge stehen zu Eurer Verfügung. Mein Sekretär überprüft derzeit die Bediensteten und entfernt alle Spuren des Angriffs auf dem Anwesen. Außerdem befindet sich ein anerkannter Magos hier, der für die agronomischen Bemühungen auf dem Planeten verantwortlich ist – er ist zufällig in dieser Woche auf Besuch, um seinen persönlichen Bericht abzuliefern. Und natürlich ist da noch meine Helferin im Krieg gegen die Rebellen, Yrliet. Sie wird mit Sicherheit gerne ihr Wissen über Janus mit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} teilen!"

languages.text: « Mon entourage et moi sommes à votre disposition. Mon secrétaire contrôle le personnel en ce moment même et se charge de remettre de l'ordre dans le domaine pour effacer toute trace de cette attaque. Un estimé magos est également présent, le responsable des opérations agronomiques qui est en visite cette semaine pour remettre son rapport personnel. Et n'oublions pas Yrliet, qui m'apporte son aide dans la guerre contre les rebelles. Je suis certaine qu'elle partagera volontiers ses connaissances de Janus avec Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: « Mon entourage et moi sommes à votre disposition. Mon secrétaire contrôle le personnel en ce moment même et se charge de remettre de l'ordre dans le domaine pour effacer toute trace de cette attaque. Un estimé magos est également présent, le responsable des opérations agronomiques qui est en visite cette semaine pour remettre son rapport personnel. Et n'oublions pas Yrliet, qui m'apporte son aide dans la guerre contre les rebelles. Je suis certaine qu'elle partagera volontiers ses connaissances de Janus avec Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: "Maiyetimle birlikte emrinizdeyiz. Biz konuşaduralım yazmanım da personeli kontrol edip konaktaki tüm saldırı izlerini siliyor. Gezegen tarımındaki bilimsel çabalardan sorumlu saygıdeğer Magos da burada. Şahsi raporunu sunmak için tesadüfen bu hafta ziyarete gelmişti. Elbette bir de asilere karşı savaşta bize yardımcı olan Yrliet var. Janus'a dair bilgi birikimini {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ile paylaşmaktan mutluluk duyacağına hiç şüphem yok!"
languages.original_text: "I, as well as my retinue, are at your service. My secretary is checking the staff as we speak and removing all traces of the attack from the estate. An esteemed Magos, who is responsible for agronomic efforts on the planet, is also here — he happened to be visiting this week to deliver his personal report. And, of course, there is my aide in the war against the rebels, Yrliet. I have no doubt she will be delighted to share her knowledge of Janus with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: "Maiyetimle birlikte emrinizdeyiz. Biz konuşaduralım yazmanım da personeli kontrol edip malikânedeki tüm saldırı izlerini siliyor. Gezegendeki tarımsal gelişmelerden sorumlu saygıdeğer Magos da burada. Şahsi raporunu sunmak için tesadüfen bu hafta ziyarete gelmişti. Bir de asilere karşı savaşta bize yardımcı olan Yrliet var. Janus'a dair bilgi birikimini {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ile paylaşmaktan mutluluk duyacağına hiç şüphem yok!"
